name: The Many Adventures of Taro T. Tuber's!
name_original: The Many Adventures of Taro T. Tuber's!
description:
Entry for Tarot Bitsy Jam

Choose a different story interpretation for set scenes to experience a wide variety of adventures.

When first playing, it is advised that you start with the BASIC story, then move on to the others afterwards to see the changes in interpretation for maximum effect.

Controls: Arrow keys or WASD

Hacks used: Transparent and Solid Items.

[NOTE: This was submitted incomplete but finished a day after the jam ended.]
